entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early this evening. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
